column1: •It is possible to hold a 6 Car Class 159 at signal SE4710, waiting line clear for the section ahead.Note: This facility may be used when a train starts from Platform 1 or 2 towards Salisbury, to clear thePlatform for another train before the preceding train has cleared the block section to Sherborne.•Trains shunting via signal SE4753 are not allowed to run into any occupied Platform for attachingpurposes•A shunting move only is allowed from one platform to another or between or to and from the sidings forthe purposes of attaching, detaching or removing vehicles from the platform.
Access is only available by use of a ‘Shunters Release’ via a ground frame. Access to and from this siding isavailable from Yeovil Junction when Yeovil Pen Mill Box is closed.
The standard {1⁄2} allowance required to stop in the loop is already included in the SRT.
* Arrive 3 minutes before crossing, depart 1 minute after
Down trains approaching Axminster EastJunction proceeding to Axminster Platform 1
